item.description:
What – Singles Dance with DJ, a great sound and light system, food, martinis, wine & optional ice breaking activities.

~ Cocktails from 7:00-9:00
~ Optional Speed Dating from 730-830. First come first served
~ Casual No-pressure Ice breakers for non-speed daters
~ Dancing with a great DJ, clean sound system and light show.

When - Saturday 21 Feb 2009

Where – Holiday Inn - Rockland (formerly the Radisson) - 781-871-0545

Food & Libations
~ Full Service Cash Bar
~ Light fare will be provided
~ Pub style menu of appetizers and light sandwiches
~ Martini menu for your drinking pleasure.

$15 for non-Meet up Members

$10 or MeetUp Members -

PREPAYMENT IS THE ONLY WAY TO GUARANTEE ADMISSION !!

As Always, please Dress to Impress - No Jeans, T-shirts or Sneakers Please

This event has been posted in more than group and website so please RSVP only once

Thanks - the mgt

***Please drink responsibly!!! …Make plans for safe transportation or reserve a room.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Single Mingle @ Rockland Holiday Inn (formely the Radisson) 7-12
